channel.title: Question
channel.description:
How i edit walls
like this?
[img]http://tjaa.dy.fi/~polypaja/moii.bmp[/img]

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Finland Finland
item.description:
@Finland wrote:

sonjichan:

Now that is a decent question. That involves modifying the client textures. Please look in client hacking section, also in the Tutorial section for a topic discussing changing textures. It’s a process of finding the ID code for a wall or a cape and finding it’s graphical/texture ID, then setting the Walls ID to the texture/graphic that you want, however it’s only visible to people who use your client or just you.

kk.

Read full topic
